title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak Review
description:
Homeworld Deserts of Kharak takes the space strategy game to the ground in a move leaving many confused and covered in sand.
Animation by @Extellus and animation audio mixing by @SirMeowMusic .
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
